issues.title: Document guardrails structure and ADR scaffolding
issues.body: Author the docs landing page, operations guide, and ADR template described in the migration plan. Ensure root Markdown placement guidance is captured.
acceptance_criteria: docs/README.md explains doc placement + links to guardrails artifacts.
docs/OPERATIONS.md inventories required config/tooling files (with gaps).
docs/ADR/ exists with README + template committed.

issues.title: Stand up module guardrails for core bot surfaces
issues.body: Create REVIEW/MODULE_matchmaker and REVIEW/MODULE_welcome folders with scope notes, surface maps, and guardrails checklists covering each runtime component.
acceptance_criteria: Module folders exist with README/checklist drafts.
Surface maps note dependencies (Sheets, HTTP server, Discord gateway).
Follow-up testing expectations captured for each module.

issues.title: Align label canon and issue batches
issues.body: Introduce .github/labels/harmonized.json and update all issue batches to use only canonical labels. Document mapping decisions in guardrails notes.
acceptance_criteria: Issue batch files reference only canon labels.
Docs map/glossary updated to reference harmonized labels.

issues.title: Fix automation drift for label syncing and CI planning
issues.body: Update sync-labels workflow to monitor labels.json, note manual run instructions, and capture next steps for CI/test automation in planning docs.
acceptance_criteria: sync-labels.yml watches labels.json and documents manual trigger usage.
Guardrails plan records CI/test workflow gaps + ownership.
Stakeholders acknowledge automation updates in acceptance checklist.
